de.lessvoid.nifty

Class NiftyConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.NiftyConfiguration

  • public final class NiftyConfiguration
extends Object
    The NiftyConfiguration class stores all the parameters a user might want to tweak when using Nifty.
    Created by void on 13.09.15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      NiftyConfiguration()

      NiftyConfiguration clearScreen(boolean clearScreen)
      Call this to let Nifty clear the screen before it renders the GUI.

      Get the current state of the clearScreen setting.

      NiftyConfiguration renderBucketHeight(int renderBucketHeight)
      Set the render bucket height.
      NiftyConfiguration renderBucketWidth(int renderBucketWidth)
      Set the render bucket width.
      NiftyConfiguration renderShowNodesOverlayColor(NiftyColor showRenderNodesOverlayColor)
      Set the showRenderNodesOverlayColor - the color used to overlay each renderNode when showRenderNodes is set to true.
      NiftyConfiguration showRenderBuckets(boolean renderShowBuckets)
      Set showRenderBuckets to true to overlay a random color quad above each updated RenderBucket.
      NiftyConfiguration showRenderNodes(boolean showRenderNodes)
      Set showRenderNodes to true to overlay a quad in the color set to the showRenderNodesOverlayColor.

    • Method Detail

      • clearScreen

        public NiftyConfiguration clearScreen(boolean clearScreen)
        Call this to let Nifty clear the screen before it renders the GUI. This might be useful when the only thing you're currently rendering is the GUI. If you render the GUI as an overlay you better not enable that :)
        The default value is false.
        Parameters:
        clearScreen - set this to true to automatically clear the screen
        Returns:
        this

      • isClearScreen

        public boolean isClearScreen()
        Get the current state of the clearScreen setting.
        Returns:
        the clearScreen setting

      • renderBucketWidth

        public NiftyConfiguration renderBucketWidth(int renderBucketWidth)
        Set the render bucket width.
        The default value is 256.
        Parameters:
        renderBucketWidth - the new width of the render buckets to use
        Returns:
        this

      • getRenderBucketWidth

        public int getRenderBucketWidth()
        Get the current render bucket width.
        Returns:
        the current render bucket width

      • renderBucketHeight

        public NiftyConfiguration renderBucketHeight(int renderBucketHeight)
        Set the render bucket height.
        The default value is 256.
        Parameters:
        renderBucketHeight - the new height of the render buckets to use
        Returns:
        this

      • showRenderBuckets

        public NiftyConfiguration showRenderBuckets(boolean renderShowBuckets)
        Set showRenderBuckets to true to overlay a random color quad above each updated RenderBucket.
        Parameters:
        renderShowBuckets - the value to set showRenderBuckets to
        Returns:
        this

      • isShowRenderBuckets

        public boolean isShowRenderBuckets()
        Get the current showRenderBuckets value.
        Returns:
        the current showRenderBuckets value

      • showRenderNodes

        public NiftyConfiguration showRenderNodes(boolean showRenderNodes)
        Set showRenderNodes to true to overlay a quad in the color set to the showRenderNodesOverlayColor.
        Parameters:
        showRenderNodes - the value to set showRenderNodes to
        Returns:
        this

        public NiftyConfiguration renderShowNodesOverlayColor(NiftyColor showRenderNodesOverlayColor)
        Set the showRenderNodesOverlayColor - the color used to overlay each renderNode when showRenderNodes is set to true.
        Parameters:
        showRenderNodesOverlayColor - the color to render showRenderNodes overlays with
